bullets: DJI Tello and edge vision demos

projects.title: Realtime Text Prediction Dashboard
projects.summary: Interactive web UI connected to a hosted transformer for streaming inference and metrics.
projects.note: Demo UI streams tokens and charts response latency.

projects.title: Tello Drone Face‑Tracking
projects.summary: Flask + React controller for a DJI Tello with OpenCV-based face tracking and telemetry.
projects.note: Real-time control with autonomous tracking sequences.

projects.title: AI Customer Support Chatbot
projects.summary: Retrieval-augmented assistant answering FAQs using your docs with citations and safety rails.
projects.note: Deployed sandbox shows accurate answers with sources.
